snippet: The Florida freshman defensive back Deiondre Porter was suspended indefinitely after being arrested on suspicion of firing a gun in the direction of his pregnant girlfriend.
abstract: University of Florida defensive back Deiondre Porter is arrested on suspicion of firing gun at his pregnant girlfriend and is suspended indefinitely by team.
lead_paragraph: The Florida freshman defensive back Deiondre Porter was suspended indefinitely after being arrested on suspicion of firing a gun in the direction of his pregnant girlfriend.
